content.body:
The [TG5 Workshop](https://github.com/tc39/tg5/blob/main/workshops/2025/108.md) co-colated with the Plenary Meeting in A Coru単a will be held on Tuesday 27th May. It'll be hosted by the Univeristy of A Coru単a.
Folks from the university have prepared several talks for us, including on Logic Programming, [polyhedral models](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polytope_model), and [the Gleam programming language](https://gleam.run/).
Preliminary programme is available [here](https://github.com/tc39/tg5/blob/main/workshops/2025/108.md).
**[Registration for the TG5 Workshop is open now](https://forms.gle/TkpzzC2Q8vLFkccy8)!**
